title: Unable to to Patch 7.7. It says "Update failed; Unspecified error occured, please check the logs
body: please i dont know what to do! can someone help me

replies.body: It sounds like your OS might be blocking the patcher from downloading the update. Take a look over the steps in our [**permission guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to make sure you have all of those permissions set up!
